channel.title: Summoning help - dementhium 639
channel.description:
which file do i have to touch to make summoning work?
i know i need to edit ActionButtonHandler.java also in skills summongtrainscroll.java summontrain.java familiar.java summoning.java and what else ? :)
Thanks for help
~Kiss my feet
